title: Machen diese Unternehmen auch Werbung?
general: Deutsch fehlt noch: Your Facebook data contains information about things you did outside of its service, eg. on other apps and websites.
companies: Deutsch fehlt:  companies that provide these so-called off Facebook events are listed in your data.
companiesWithAds: Deutsch fehlt: of those companies also present advertising to you. Coincidence?
total: Insgesamt {{number_companies}} Apps und Websites, die Sie außerhalb von Facebook verwenden, senden Informationen darüber an Facebook zurück. {{number_companiesWithAds}} davon senden Infos über Ihre Einkäufe.
details.text.1: Looking at on and off Facebook events over time different patterns might emerge. Off events seem to be followed by on events or vice versa. The data does not prove causality, but this is an interesting starting point for further exploration.
details.text.2: We are showing the last 90 days because Facebook only stores on events that long. Maybe you remember some of your activities in the last 3 months? Or you will be more conscious from now on.
fallback.title: Facebook knows what you did elsewhere
fallback.text.1: Here are the (top 5)  companies (websites, apps) which reported the most to Facebook, sorted by the number of activities they reported.
fallback.text.2: Companies sorted by number of activities they share with Facebook
fallback.text.3: types of activities have been forwarded to Facebook by those companies. The (top 5) types that triggered your off Facebook events are:
